title: League of Legends is not a sport
body: It is a video game. And one day it will be gone. Try not to take it so seriously that you start harassing others for being bad.

replies.body:
Nothing is a sport, everything will eventually be gone

Care for nothing
Sports like Soccer, and baseball;l have been around for 100s of years, and football is about to be 100 years old itself. And they are not going anywhere.

Well that is simply not true. Tell me, how many more years do you think playing cards will last? Kind of a timeless human activity there.
Are you seriously saying those sports will be around until the universe collapses? Pretty long odds.

To address the title, I guess it would really depend on what you consider to be a "sport".

Technically, a sport by definition is;

*"An activity involving physical exertion and skill in which an individual or team competes against another or others for entertainment."*

So you're right, it can't be considered a sport. But there is another definition that can be used, e-sport.

*"A multiplayer video game played competitively for spectators, typically by professional gamers."*

So league is certainly an e-sport.

People can play soccer casually or seriously, it's their choice. I see no reason that someone couldn't play league either casually or seriously. That doesn't mean a person is allowed to harass someone for playing poorly, but at no point should a person be compelled to play the game with only a casual outlook.
League of legends is a competitive game that people care about. You have to appreciate that.

League of Legends is an esport. 2018 worlds got more viewership than the 2018 super bowl. Esports will continue to grow and will dwarf every other sport in the future.

I said all of that only to entertain your incorrect argument. Staying power or how old something is, doesn't make it a sport. A rock is a sport by your definition. The only argument you would have is if your definition of sport involves physical exertion. Then you have to classify something like Chess as something else other than a sport.

Eh, I get the message you're trying to get across, but how about a difference in phrasing?

A video game, or any activity, can be both fun and competitive at the same time. There's no excuse for harassing others **for any reason**, whether they're in it just for fun, for excitement, a little bit of both, or any reason at all.
Yes, there is no reason to get worked up. Win or lose you should still try to be having a good time. It is not like anyone here is going to be losing money or making money off it.
Ever heard of esports?

League of legends is just the newest Esport. it won't be around forever and some new game will take its place. Either a new MOBA, or something else. That is one of the issues with Esports, it is always changing. Something like baseball will be around forever.
